name: One-Jump Robo
description:
One-Jump Robo is a game made for GMTK Game Jam 2019

This little robot only has enough air to make a single jump, so use it wisely.

This was my first game jam and I had a lot of fun making this game and I really feel like I learned a lot as well.

Music is "Odyssey" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
